          <title>
            <string language="en">Removing bits of fruit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Löschen der Bits der Frucht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Retirer des morceaux de fruit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Removendo os bits da fruta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rimozione dei bit di frutta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφαίρεση των δυαδικών ψηφίων των φρούτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Quitar dígitos binarios de la fruta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a cotton material that is used to separate bits of fruit from the fruit juice.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">filter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cotton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fruit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">juice</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Baumwollmaterial, das 
benutzt wird, um Bits der Frucht vom Fruchtsaft zu trennen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un matériel de coton 
qui est employé pour séparer des morceaux de fruit du jus de fruit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um material do algodão 
que seja usado separar bits da fruta do suco de fruta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un materiale del 
cotone che è usato per separare i bit di frutta dal succo di frutta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει υλικό βαμβακιού που 
χρησιμοποιείται στα χωριστά δυαδικά ψηφία των φρούτων από το 
χυμό φρούτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un material del 
algodón que se utilice para separar dígitos binarios de la fruta del
zumo de fruta.</string>
          </description>
